Agreed.  Looks badass, but doesn't look like a League champ.

Looks pretty good, I was just thinking about the rework again and it hit me. Why does taric have to be an ugly gay guy? Why cant he be an attractive gay guy that the ladies cant have? Nice look, nice armour. What lady doesnt like jewels? You know give him some nice armour like Kayle {{champion:10}}  and Garen {{champion:86}}  But make him pretty kinda like EZ {{champion:81}} and Jayce {{champion:126}} . Give em those piercing eyes that every women would fall into with a smirk and tada, Taric is a real something. Also the long Thick flowing hair. Maybe scale Him up to about Garen {{champion:86}}  and Braums {{champion:201}}  Size. Slim him slightly like {{champion:2}} and {{champion:80}} , keep him toned and slim the Hammer a bit. That's all i have for now.

But...where is the fabolousness?
The handsomeness?

I don't like him :C
I even like the concept we've seen a couple days ago more than this.
It's just too brutal and not sensitive at all.

Well, it is sensitive, but it is also majestic and otherworthly, which is what taris IS SUPPOSED TO BE

According to his lore he is the last of a badass order of paladins who uses the power of the earth, he is not supposed to be slender and feminine, he is supposed to be like a gem istelf, full of colour, life, but also near unbreakable and timeless

You have a point, but honestly, I think that Taric here looks like a Garen who has learned arts of gem magic. It doesn't feel as light as Taric was supposed to be. I mean, I can't imagine that concept having a voice of a loving father, face of an angel and hair of a noble that everyone associates Taric with.
